table.name: vtiger_checklistitems
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_checklistitems` ( `checklistitemsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `checklistitem_no` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `allow_upload` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `allow_note` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `checklistname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `category` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `checklistitem_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `status_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `status_time` time DEFAULT NULL, `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_checklistitemscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_checklistitemscf` ( `checklistitemsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`checklistitemsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_checklistitems_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_checklistitems_settings` ( `checklistid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `checklistname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `modulename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ordering` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`checklistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_checklistitems_settings_items
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_checklistitems_settings_items` ( `itemid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `allow_upload` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `allow_note` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `description` text, `category` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` date DEFAULT NULL, `checklistid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`itemid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_checklistitems_permissions
